text: Man xeꞌkiriq ta kꞌut chilaꞌ. Rumal riꞌ are xkijururej bꞌik ri Jasón xuqujeꞌ nikꞌaj kojonelabꞌ chik che kikꞌexwach xeꞌkikꞌam bꞌik chikiwach ri qꞌatal tzij rech ri tinimit. Xkiraq kichiꞌ xkibꞌij: Ri Pablo rachiꞌl ri Silas tajin kakikoj kꞌaxkꞌolal chikixoꞌl ri winaq pa ronojel ri uwachulew e kꞌo kꞌu waral chanim tajin kakisach ri kichomabꞌal ri qawinaq.
